236: The Home of a Century-Old Unique Flavor
ils: We add flavor to every table with our high-quality, fresh, and warm lavash.
445: For over 30 years, we have been producing lavash bread â€” a cultural heritage unique to both our hometown Erzincan and our country â€” with great care and precision. By preserving our traditional methods, our lavash adds a unique flavor to both your everyday meals and your special moments. Our goal is not only to offer a delicious product but also to keep Erzincanâ€™s cultural values alive and share them with our people. Each lavash we make reflects both our long-standing experience and our commitment to quality.

media.sabah.title: Sabah â€“ Century-Old Lavash Delight
about.paragraph1: In Erzincan, traditional lavash bread is baked at 55 degrees while preserving its original taste and unique features. Included in UNESCOâ€™s Intangible Cultural Heritage List, lavash is carefully prepared by skilled hands and served on tables without losing its quality.
about.paragraph2: Our company, producing in Erzincan for over 30 years, combines traditional methods with modern quality standards to craft each lavash meticulously. Our goal is not only to provide delicious products but also to preserve cultural values and pass Erzincan's heritage to future generations.
about.paragraph3: Every lavash reflects the experience of our master bakers and our dedication to quality. The trust and satisfaction of our customers are our greatest motivation. Each lavash delivered to your table represents the traditional taste of Erzincan.
